title: Soldier providing security to MP’s residence in Wellawatta found dead
body_lines: A soldier assigned for security at MP MA Sumanthiran's residence in Wellawatta was found dead with gunshot wounds this morning.
The victim was identified as a 22-year old, a resident of Walapane.
Police suspect that the soldier had shot himself using a T56 assault rifle. It was reported that around eight soldiers were assigned for duties at the residence of the MP.
